Title: Directs payment of certain taxes into the central business district tolling capital lockbox fund to be made without appropriation
Summary: Directs payment of certain internet sales and use taxes into the central business district tolling capital lockbox fund partially dedicated for the MTA to be made without appropriation.
LawCode: Amd §§4 & 99-ff, St Fin L; amd §553-j, Pub Auth L; amd §§1261 & 1148, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, the public authorities law and the tax law, in relation to directing payment of certain taxes into the central business district tolling capital lockbox fund to be made without appropriation
